rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your programs.)[/i]
Whenever this Subroutine runs, choose one – 
• Create Noop, a legendary 3/3 Construct artifact creature token with defender.
• Target Construct loses defender and becomes a 5/5 Avatar with vigilance.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target Avatar. It gains trample and indestructible.
